name: Unchained
title: Why Stablecoins Matter Globally
text:
Synopsis
Stablecoins provide critical financial infrastructure for developing fintech applications in regions lacking traditional banking building blocks, enabling financial innovation in underserved markets.

Key Insights
- Most of the world lacks basic financial infrastructure for building fintech applications
- In the US and Europe, financial APIs and banking infrastructure exist, albeit with challenges
- Stablecoins offer an alternative financial foundation for creating payment and financial services in regions without established banking systems
- Examples of potential applications include creating Chime-like services for Argentina or Venmo-like platforms for Africa
- Traditional financial building blocks are typically absent in developing markets, limiting fintech innovation
